title: Short-Term Course for Language Leadership Competency Enhancement Using Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and foundational understanding of language education concepts
context.additional_context: A course focused on designing and implementing language learning projects in virtual environments for managers/leaders, optimized for smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can structure problem-based learning (PBL) language education scenarios in three or more stages on a virtual platform.
Learners can select two digital educational tools usable in a smartphone environment and apply them to a project.
Learners can define three metrics for measuring learner engagement in virtual environments and integrate them into an evaluation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
